name: Enhanced Internet Relay Chat (EIRC2)
short_description: EIRC2 is a decentralized instant messaging system, extending the Internet Relay Chat protocol. Supported platforms: Linux, MS Windows, Java, etc. Programming languages: Java Main tasks: normal instant-messaging, channels, video- and voicechat, file-trans
